duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead sourcing execution across IT Categories to meet the long-range requirements of the business partners.
Collaborate with Category Leads to assure alignment of objectives including quality, reliability, innovation, and cost.
Deliver on financial, service, reliability, quality, innovation, and growth commitments.
Build and maintain relationships throughout the organization resulting in a dynamic interactive dialogue on a broad range of perspectives and critical information.
Develop deep supplier relationships with strategic suppliers to include data review and analysis, performance management, and improvement of end-to-end value.
Identify, develop and direct the implementation of sourcing goals and category strategies based on deep subject matter expertise and an informal understanding of industry/market dynamics.
Escalate issues that may impact the strategic sourcing and procurement organization.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree is required. Master's preferred.
